Subject: Exchange Request: Canon PIXMA MG3620 Printer Issue

Dear Customer Support team, I recently purchased a Canon PIXMA MG3620 printer from your online store. Upon setup, I discovered incorrect wireless configuration settings. I would like to request an exchange for this item. Please advise on the procedure You can reach me at fatima.farsi@help.com.. Thank you, <name> My name is John Doe.. My order reference is <order_ref_num>.
